spec_data.Name: perl-srpm-macros
spec_data.Description:
These RPM macros are used for building Perl source packages from source
repositories. They influence build-requires set into the source package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:00:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: RPM macros for building Perl source package from source repository
